page.title: 08CWMBACH W.I.
page.content: Since 1920 Cwmbach Women's Institute have been meeting in the Iron Room, Cwmbach. We are affiliated to the National Federation with their headquarters in London and locally to the Powys-Radnor Federation. We hold our meetings once a month. Our 17 members come from the local community and paid a fee of Â£4 for their membership this year. We have a committee of 8 members but all business decisions are made democratically. This year we have had speakers on a wide range of subjects from Pharmaceutical Antiques to soft- toy making and vetinary work. We enter as many federation competitions as we can and did very well with our craft, cookery and floral exhibits at Open Day in Llandrindod this year. We are often surprised that even in a small group we discover so much talent.
